      • deleteDirectoryFromBottomUp

        public static void deleteDirectoryFromBottomUp(java.io.File dir)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes directories from deepest to shallowest to prevent file locking issues caused by the Watch Service on Windows (see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6255463/java7-watchservice-access-denied-error-trying-to-delete-recursively-watched-ne)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
